select DATE_FORMAT(ba.CREATE_TIME,'%Y年第%u周') WEEKS, CONCAT(wx.WX_NICK_NAME, ba.CREATE_TIME) TITLE, ba.DEV_RESONATE from t_post_base ba left join t_wx_user wx on ba.USER_ID = wx.USER_ID where ba.IS_DEL = 0 group by WEEKS, DEV_RESONATE, ID order by WEEKS desc, DEV_RESONATE desc
